channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Orchestration Designer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Orchestration Designer

item.title: CVE-2018-15612|2024-08-05T10:01:54.357Z -- avaya -- orchestration%20designer
item.description: A CSRF vulnerability in the Runtime Config component of Avaya Aura Orchestration Designer could allow an attacker to add, change, or remove administrative settings. Affected versions of Avaya Aura Orchestration Designer include all versions up to 7.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2018-15613|2024-08-05T10:01:53.675Z -- avaya -- orchestration%20designer
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Runtime Config component of Avaya Aura Orchestration Designer could result in malicious content being returned to the user. Affected versions of Avaya Aura Orchestration Designer include all versions up to 7.2.1.
